Uses of Package
edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.sensors

Packages that use edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.sensors
edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.sensors   
edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.touchemulation   
 

Classes in edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.sensors used by edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.sensors
CameraGestureSensor
          CameraGestureSensor takes input data from the camera and uses that to sense four gesture commands: up, down, left, and right.
CameraGestureSensor.Listener
          To receive messages from CameraGestureSensor, classes must implement the CameraGestureSensor.Listener interface.
ClickSensor
          Class ClickSensor is an abstract base class to all other click sensors.
ClickSensor.Listener
          Listener for classes that derive from ClickSensor.
 

Classes in edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.sensors used by edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.touchemulation
CameraGestureSensor
          CameraGestureSensor takes input data from the camera and uses that to sense four gesture commands: up, down, left, and right.
CameraGestureSensor.Listener
          To receive messages from CameraGestureSensor, classes must implement the CameraGestureSensor.Listener interface.
ClickSensor
          Class ClickSensor is an abstract base class to all other click sensors.
ClickSensor.Listener
          Listener for classes that derive from ClickSensor.
